name: Just Don't Die
description:
Hi, my name is survibunny.

I can't remember how I got here, but I'm really scared, I need to get out fast.

Try the executable for a better experience. Instructions Below!

An Enemy is approaching Survibunny!

Can you help Survibunny to make it out alive?

Click Survibunny to make him stop, be careful tho, it's a delicate creature.

Click the environment and different things may happen, keep your eyes open.

Try again, press esc and try as many times as you need.

A difficult challenge awaits you. Can you beat the level without survibunny dying?

Without your help a sad fate awaits Survibunny

Survibunny is in a mad dash to escape, help him! You are it's only hope!
